name: Slug Soccer Championship
description:
a Game about Sea Slugs that love to play soccer
online functionality
the game is balanced around 3v3 matches but there's no real limit to the amount of players 

its currently using the free version of photon so only 20 people can play online at a time
how to play:
give yourself a nickname
create or join a room then wait for the host to start the game or start the game if you're the host
